beam.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                BEAM
00004 !
00005 !  Sets up particle beam on CPU 0
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine beam
00010  
00011   use physvars
00012   use treevars
00013   use utils
00014   implicit none
00015   integer :: i, p, iseed1, iseed2
00016   real :: Volb, dpx, yt, zt
00017   real :: vx_beam, vy_beam, vz_beam, ct, cp, st, sp
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021 
00022   !  evaluate system constants  from inputs:
00023   !  beam cylinder volume:  r_beam is radius
00024   
00025 
00026   if (my_rank.eq.0) then
00027 
00028      write(*,*) 'Setting up particle beam ',r_beam,' x ',x_beam
00029    Volb = pi*r_beam**2*x_beam
00030    qeb = Volb*rho_beam/np_beam    ! charge
00031    dpx=x_beam/np_beam           ! x-axis spacing
00032    iseed2 = -131 - np_beam -3*me ! seed
00033    iseed1 = -333 - np_beam -3*me
00034 
00035   ! proton beam: initialised along x-axis
00036 
00037   ! beam initialised along x-axis and rotated by theta, phi
00038 
00039    ct = cos(theta_beam)
00040    st = sin(theta_beam)
00041    cp = cos(phi_beam)
00042    sp = sin(phi_beam)
00043    vz_beam = u_beam*st
00044    vx_beam = u_beam*ct*cp
00045    vy_beam = u_beam*ct*sp
00046 
00047    i = 0
00048 
00049    do while (i < np_beam)
00050      yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed2)-1.)          
00051      zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)  
00052      if (yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00053         i = i+1
00054         p = npp+i  ! put them after plasma ions
00055         x(p)= start_beam + dpx*i
00056         y(p) = yt + yl/1.9
00057         z(p) = zt + zl/1.8
00058         q(p) = qeb
00059         m(p) = -qeb*mass_beam
00060         ux(p)=vx_beam
00061         uy(p)=vy_beam
00062         uz(p)=vz_beam
00063         pepid(p) = me                ! processor ID
00064         pelabel(p) = npart+np_beam+i  ! labels
00065      endif
00066    end do
00067   endif
00068 
00069   npp = npp + np_beam
00070 
00071   npart = npart + np_beam  ! Augment particle numbers for all CPUs
00072 ! zero fields
00073   Ex(1:npp) = 0
00074   Ey(1:npp) = 0
00075   Ez(1:npp) = 0
00076   Bx(1:npp) = 0
00077   By(1:npp) = 0
00078   Bz(1:npp) = 0
00079   Ax(1:npp) = 0
00080   Ay(1:npp) = 0
00081   Az(1:npp) = 0
00082   Axo(1:npp) = 0
00083   Ayo(1:npp) = 0
00084   Azo(1:npp) = 0
00085   pot(1:npp) = 0
00086   work(1:npp) = 1.   ! set work load balanced initially
00087 
00088 end subroutine beam
